definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: cut up, cut in pieces, divide by joints (Dr:1Sa 11:7; NH id., Pi.; rare);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִתַּח]] Le 8:20, [[וְנִתַּח]] consec. Le 1:6, Le 1:12; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְנַתַּח]] 1Ki 18:33, sf. [[וַיְנַתְּחֵ֫הוּ]] 1Sa 11:7, [[וַיְנַתְּחֶ֫הָ]] Ju Jdg 19:29, etc.;—cut up, in pieces, c. acc. of animals 1Sa 11:7, of woman Ju Jdg 20:6 (all these to be sent about as token for assembling warriors; on signif. of the practice cf. RS:Sem i. 383; 2nd ed. 402) ; elsewh. usu. + [[לִנְתָחִים]], cut up into pieces, of woman Ju.Jdg 19:29 ; of sacrificial animals 1Ki 18:23, 1Ki 18:33 (acc. only), Ex 29:17, Le 1:6, Le 1:12, Le 8:20 (all P).
